name: lazy-llm
author: LazyLLM Maintainer <cccc38753@gmail.com>
description: Multi-LLM desktop interface built with Electron, Vue, and TypeScript.

scripts.build:preloads: bunx esbuild electron/preload.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --external:electron --outfile=dist-electron/preload.cjs && bunx esbuild electron/pane-preload.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --external:electron --outfile=dist-electron/pane-preload.cjs && bunx esbuild electron/quick-prompt-preload.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --external:electron --outfile=dist-electron/quick-prompt-preload.cjs
scripts.build:electron-artifacts: bun run build:preloads && bun run build:inject
scripts.dev:electron: bun run build:electron-artifacts && cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite
scripts.build: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && bun run build:electron-artifacts
